synopsis.text:
Figher coach, Eiichi Suo..?! Are they crazy? [source: AnimeNfo]

In the year 2061, Neo Pro-Wrestling reigns supreme as the most popular sport, combining traditional wrestling with high-tech powered Metal Suits that amplify fighters' speed and power for breathtaking action. Enter The Pretty Four, a team of determined young women - Miku, Ginko, Sayaka, and Nana - who aspire to become the ultimate champions of this futuristic sport. Facing formidable opponents like the Crushers and the Lady Ninjas, the Pretty Four embark on a grand championship elimination tournament.

However, the path to victory is not easy, as the girls face challenges both inside and outside the arena. With a seemingly washed-up coach, Eiichi Suo, and personal struggles in their daily lives, the Pretty Four must remain united and persevere. As they rise in the ranks and confront their idol, Aquamarine, they uncover hidden secrets behind Neo Pro-Wrestling and learn the true purpose of their coach. Can Miku and her friends surpass their idol and achieve their dream of becoming the champions? Only time will tell in this thrilling world of high-stakes wrestling.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
